resources.string: Players alternate placing Xs and Os on the board until either one player has three in a row, horizontally, vertically, or diagonally; or all nine squares are filled. If a player is able to draw three of their Xs or three of their Os in a row, then that player wins.\n\nChoose \"Multiplayer\" to play against a friend or \"Single Player\" to play against the computer. Click on an open space to place your character on the gameboard.
Do you want to go first or second?
